- Invoice.Date: 95% — "Datum: 23.1.2024" appears twice near invoice number and payment reference.

- Vat.Amount: 82% — VAT column shows 86,01 + 5,86 = 91,87 which matches 10% of net lines; value appears in table though not consolidated as a single labeled total.
